title: I got a 2 week ban and wondering when im honourable again.
body: Well, i was banned and i deserved it but im just wondering if you guys know if im dishonourable for the whole season or just a certain time.. if im dishonourable for a certain time how long do you think it'll take?

replies.body: Basically your honour will be locked for the duration of the punishment (which is more relevant for chat restrictions since you can't play anyway). After that you can start earning honour again. Positive behaviour will earn you honour faster than neutral behaviour, and negative behaviour (even if it doesn't result in punishment) will prevent you from earning any honour for that game.
